diff_act: 2.include other necessary information such as the train type, location, or direction of travel
3.inform the driver of a busy line

regen.absent_element: indication of network issues or busy line to the controller
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver of either a busy line or network issues when the call connection is unsuccessful, and also display a corresponding message.

label: This shall also indicate if the called party was busy or if the network could not connect the call.
absence: specific indication of unsuccessful connect: busy or network error
